item.description:
http://www.facebook.com/event.php?eid=277342688949274 Please join us at JOSE MCINTYRE'S on Monday, September 12 to watch the fifth GOP primary debate of the presidential cycle.

The debate being hosted by CNN/Tea Party Express and will take place in Tampa, FL. At the time of this posting, the following candidates have confirmed that they will be at the debate: Bachmann, Cain, Gingrich, Hunstman, Johnson, PAUL, Romney, and Santorum. Perry has not confirmed at this time.

The debate is scheduled to start at 8PM EST. We have the upstairs reserved from 7:30-11.

Some things to keep in mind:
-NO UNDER 21 ADMITTED
-JOSE MCINTYRE'S does not validate parking. If I recall correctly, I parked at the Government Center garage last debate for $10.
item.name: Boston Debate-Watching Party
